<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Eobald](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2379)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 53</row>

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Halfling](/Languages.aspx?ID=7), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +13, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +11, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +11, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +13, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +12, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +11

<row gap="medium">

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

ragged robes

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 60

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="" />
fist +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Wizard Spells Prepared** DC 22, attack +14
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)
- **2nd**
[Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197)
- **3rd**
[Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [Secret Page](/Spells.aspx?ID=270)

**Wizard School Spells 1 Focus Point,** DC 22
- **3rd**
[Warped Terrain](/Spells.aspx?ID=537)

</column>
name: Eobald
